DOC.criteria: Gender : male female , sex ratio exceed 2/3 ; 1845 year ( include upper low limit ) , general situation good ; Body mass index ( BMI ) 1928 ( include upper low limit range ) , BW ≥ 50kg ( female ) 60kg ( male ) ; Nearly half year , child care program agree take effective measure contraception study period , woman childbearing age blood pregnancy test negative ; Subjects fully understand purpose , property , method reaction may occur test drug trials.Voluntarily sign informed consent , agree abide requirement clinical protocol . Primary disease important organ ; Mental physical disability ; Familial hereditary disease ; Screening supine blood pressure ( 5 minute rest ) systolic diastolic blood pressure great 90~140mmHg , beyond scope 50~90mmHg , Or pulse ( HR ) beyond 50bpm~100bpm Abnormal result clinically meaningful physical examination , vital sign , ECG clinical laboratory ; History immunodeficiency disease , include HIV antibody positive ; Detection antibody positive , hepatitis B surface antigen antibody hepatitis C / syphilis positive ; Alcohol drug abuser ; Smoking drinking ( drink 14 unit alcohol per week : 1 unit = beer 285 ml , liquor 25 ml , wine 1 cup . number daily smoke ≥ 5 ) / smoke drink test period ; Any discharge period may affect study drug , past 3 month participate drug clinical trial ; Before enter group 4 week use prescription drug enter group , use non prescription drug within 2 week ( vitamin , herbal tonic , food additive ) , group within 2 week take effect drug metabolize enzyme food , grapefruit grapefruit drink . Can use acetaminophen , must record report CRF ; The last 3 month history blood donation significant blood loss ( 400ml ) ; There drug , clinical significance history food allergy atopic allergic disease ( asthma , urticaria , eczema dermatitis ) know drug test drug similar drug allergy test ; Lactating woman , pregnant woman unable take effective contraceptive measure ; Researchers believe suitable take test factor participant .
